summary: Milo tries to be a family man and run his criminal organization, but a wrong drug shipment endangers everything.
cast: Zlatko Buric|Marinela Dekic|Slavko Labovic|Ramadan Huseini|Ilyas Agac|Kujtim Loki|Vasilije Bojicic|Levino Jensen|Marek Magierecki|Sven Erik Eskeland Larsen|Karsten Schrøder|Hakan Turan|Susan Petersen|Gitte Dan|Tommy Christensen|Pelle Hougaard Nielsen|Benny Fjeldmose|Slavica Knezevic|Philip Riviera|Erkan Jakupi|Zinedine Gaceb|Ieva Bieza|Kurt Nielsen|Hong Ming Lau|Linse Kessler|Dan Dommer
title: Pusher 3: Soy el ángel de la muerte
